title: Global Reincarnation: Becoming A God With My Unlimited Revive - Novel Updates
tags: Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Late Romance   Level System   Male Protagonist   Multiple Identities   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Reincarnated as a Monster   Reincarnation   Romantic Subplot   Skill Assimilation   Soul Power   Special Abilities   Transformation Ability   Underestimated Protagonist   Weak to Strong   World Travel
author: One Punch Cute King   一拳萌王
description:
Every human on Earth was transformed into a summoned monster and was summoned to another world.
Every summoned monster only had one life and was gifted with ability right from the start.
The abilities ranged from Wind Blade to Fireball, Ice Arrow, Guardian Shield, Heal, Illusion, and so forth.
Li Xuan was also summoned to another world, but his ability was the Unlimited Revive System. Whenever he revived once, he would get another ability.>
